parameters.name: testtype
parameters.description: Global image scheme. Can be dense (PEBL original), sparse, or McKone.

parameters.name: fontsize
parameters.description: Font size to display local stimulus and to use as a template for the global stimulus

parameters.name: globalheight
parameters.description: Width in pixels of global stimulus

parameters.name: reps
parameters.description: Number of trials per condition in each block

parameters.name: stimdummy
parameters.description: Neutral dummy stimulus.  Navon used more of a O. Could also try ▓█▄

parameters.name: giveErrorfeedback
parameters.description: Should error feedback be given on each trial

parameters.name: doscatterconditions
parameters.description: Should you include 'scatter' conditions as blocks 6/7 (spatial uncertainty)

parameters.name: scatterwidth
parameters.description: Width of x uncertainty in scatter blocks

parameters.name: scatterheight
parameters.description: Height of y uncertainty in scatter blocks
